content.raw:
can ign-cmake0 and ign-cmake1 installed side-by-side? I'm trying to compile ign-common's `Components` branch. I have ign-cmake0 installed from deb and ign-cmake1 from source and I am now getting at an error that seems like ign-cmake1 is looking for ign-cmake0 files?

~~~
CMake Error: File /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/ignition-component-config.cmake.in does not exist.
CMake Error at /usr/share/cmake-3.5/Modules/CMakePackageConfigHelpers.cmake:323 (configure_file):
  configure_file Problem configuring file
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /home/osrf/code/ian/ign_ws/devel/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake1/cmake1/IgnPackaging.cmake:290 (configure_package_config_file)
  /home/osrf/code/ian/ign_ws/devel/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake1/cmake1/IgnUtils.cmake:1140 (_ign_create_cmake_package)
  av/src/CMakeLists.txt:13 (ign_add_component)
~~~

Note I'm doing this in a catkin workspace that uses ign-math's `ign-math4` branch, not sure if that matters.
content.html:
can ign-cmake0 and ign-cmake1 installed side-by-side? I'm trying to compile ign-common's Components branch. I have ign-cmake0 installed from deb and ign-cmake1 from source and I am now getting at an error that seems like ign-cmake1 is looking for ign-cmake0 files?

CMake Error: File /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/ignition-component-config.cmake.in does not exist.
CMake Error at /usr/share/cmake-3.5/Modules/CMakePackageConfigHelpers.cmake:323 (configure_file):
  configure_file Problem configuring file
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /home/osrf/code/ian/ign_ws/devel/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake1/cmake1/IgnPackaging.cmake:290 (configure_package_config_file)

  av/src/CMakeLists.txt:13 (ign_add_component)

Note I'm doing this in a catkin workspace that uses ign-math's ign-math4 branch, not sure if that matters.
